Question: STMicroelectronics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
STMicroelectronics NV

Product: EV Power Electronic Innovations at CES 2024

- Partnership with Flex Power Modules to demonstrate advanced power electronics for next-generation electric vehicles (EVs) at CES 2024
- Showcase of Flex’s adoption of STMicroelectronics’ silicon carbide (SiC) MOSFETs and other key products to power its High Voltage (HV) Combo Units for EVs
- Flex’s HV Combo Units feature a bi-directional design for vehicle-to-load and vehicle-to-grid functionality, high-voltage pre-charge, and AI-driven tools for streamlining contract reviews
- Focus on enabling automakers to launch leading mobility products with reliability, resilience, and speed through collaboration with STMicroelectronics
